## Quarto

```{r output = FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r echo = FALSE}
diamonds |> 
  group_by(cut, color) |> 
  summarise(mean = mean(carat)) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = cut, y = mean, fill = color)) +
  geom_col(position = "dodge") +
  theme_bw()

```
